text: the firecracker chili pepper is a relatively easy plant to grow provided you have the right conditions here are some steps to help you get started choose a location firecracker Chili Peppers need plenty of sunlight so choose a location that gets at least six to eight hours of direct sunlight per day they also prefer well-drained soil with a fur between 6.2 and 7.0 start from seed you can start your firecracker Chili Peppers from seed indoors about six to eight weeks before the last expected Frost or you can serve them directly in the garden after all danger a Frost has passed transplant seedlings if you started your firecracker Chili Peppers from seed indoors transplant them outside once they have at least two sets of true leaves and the soil has warmed up to at least 60 degrees Fahrenheit space them about 18 to 24 inches apart water regularly keep the soil moist but not
